value.0:
I changed most of the shifter weapons to Rapiers, so it's easier for them to focus in one weapon, with the exception of the Minotaur Axe and Kobold Dagger, these are a tad bit more powerful to offset the loss of focus and other feats.

All custom polymorph items are on the palette under Special / Custom 4

If you don't like a the weapon type, simply copy the resref name of the item you want to change, delete it, and then create a new weapon of your choice.  Then give it the resref & tagname exactly how you copied the original.

You must have the Polymorph.2da file included in the download in your override folder for these weapons to be given to the various polymorph forms.

Note, I originally made these weapons for my campaign, that doesn't mean you have to like them, because all of the weapons are adjustable to your likings, this module is a great resource for those wanting to customize the polymorph options.  Just be sure to export all the items you change into an erf and improt them into the module you will be using them in.  Enjoy. =)

Genisys
